The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 18 July is 51,669 (5,980.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 July, there were 2,895 new confirmed cases (335.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 July, there were 2,050 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 41% (845 extra cases).
